entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening then changing to rain before morning. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the evening then becoming east 20 gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast overnight. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 31 March 2023
